name: Incident Response for Command Execution Attack
description: This playbook addresses incidents where an attacker executed shell commands to exfiltrate sensitive data from the network.

action--c4f3e1b7-6237-4a68-bf6c-250c5cba.name: Kill malicious process
action--c4f3e1b7-6237-4a68-bf6c-250c5cba.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

parallel--8b9a2d09-f187-49a5-b5cc-19271a.name: Immediate Response Actions
parallel--8b9a2d09-f187-49a5-b5cc-19271a.description: Contain incident and take immediate action on affected hosts.

action--ee0d9f8f-5cc1-4cd2-9fb0-57d430b3.name: Quarantine affected systems
action--ee0d9f8f-5cc1-4cd2-9fb0-57d430b3.description: Isolate all affected hosts from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

commands.command: for host in $(get-affected-hosts); do isolate $host; done

action--1f4988bb-8187-493c-90dc-5d313d22.name: Analyze logs for additional indicators
action--1f4988bb-8187-493c-90dc-5d313d22.description: Check system logs for further signs of compromise.

action--621fb972-fedc-4ee1-bbcf-16ce43c3.name: Deploy endpoint detection and response tool
action--621fb972-fedc-4ee1-bbcf-16ce43c3.description: Install an endpoint detection and response tool to monitor activities.

action--fa1e6ea5-8f4b-4e0b-b0e3-a063a5f6.name: Notify security team of incident
action--fa1e6ea5-8f4b-4e0b-b0e3-a063a5f6.description: Send a notification to the security team regarding the incident.
